In the icy expanse of the Arctic, there lived a polar bear named Binky, who was different from his kin. While others thrived in the cold, Binky adored the sun. Each day, he would climb the highest icebergs, basking in the warm rays, dreaming of sandy beaches. One fateful day, a sudden thaw revealed a hidden lagoon. Binky, with a heart full of hope, ventured to the water's edge. To his surprise, the sun reflected off the waves, creating a dazzling spectacle. He splashed and danced, realizing that the sun was not just a dream but a part of his icy world, too.
